animeDescription: In this film, because of complaints from children that Goku is depicted as too much of an eager student, he is instead portrayed as a very naughty modern boy. It then received so many complaints from the PTA about its bad language that it was forced out of the show after all.  (Source: Official Site)
animeRelated: ['Boku no Son Gokuu', 'Gokuu no Daibouken Pilot']
animeStaff: [['Sugii Gisaburou', ['Director']], ['Suzuki Yoshio', ['Sound Director']], ['Dezaki Osamu', ['Episode Director', 'Storyboard', 'Animation Director', 'Key Animation']], ['Hata Masami', ['Episode Director']]]
